Cherrycake\Image::isFilesExists

isFilesExists

Checks if all files for this Image exists or not. All files are checked if this image has sizes. Only the first size is checked if $isCheckOnlyFirstSize is true. If the image hasn't sizes, only the corresponding file is checked

    Signature

    public function isFilesExists([boolean $isCheckOnlyFirstSize = false] )

    Parameters

    $isCheckOnlyFirstSize — boolean
    Whether to check only the first size (if this image has sizes) for improved performance.

    Returns

    boolean
    Whether all the image files exist or not.
